activation.condition: When you hit an enemy with a trick attack

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

When you hit an enemy with a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)}, you can forgo your trick attack damage to apply three @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{Debilitating Trick (Ex)} effects instead of two. If you spend a Resolve Point and have the extended debilitation exploit, you can use that exploit to increase the duration of all three debilitating tricks. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.jd4qWJS9qElePrhf]{Double Debilitation (Ex)} class feature to learn this exploit.
